heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) (Amendment) (No. 3) Regulations
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (no 10) (amendment) (no 3) regulation

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: 2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary
text_raw:
2. Regulation 1 of the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 2020) is 
amended, in paragraph (2), by the substitution of “5th day of April 2021” for 
“5th day of March 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

5 March, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [95] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947) and
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No. 10) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 701 of 2020) to 
provide that the Regulations shall remain in operation until 05 April 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [95]
